data.description:
Our virtual reality training app for pumper operations can significantly enhance the training experience for firefighters, leading to improved performance and safety when responding to real-world emergencies.

Benefits

    Safety: Provides a risk-free environment where firefighters can practice pumper operations without the dangers of real-life emergencies.

    Realistic Scenarios: Firefighters can experience 360-degree views and accurate 3D representations of various scenarios.

    Cost-Effectiveness: More cost-effective than traditional training methods, as it reduces the need for physical resources and can be conducted without the operational costs of actual equipment.

    On-Demand Training: Firefighters can access training anytime and anywhere, allowing for flexible scheduling and repeated practice without the constraints of coordinating with live training events.

    Skill Development: Firefighters develop practical skills, learn to cope with stress, and practice using equipment in a safe environment.

    Engagement and Retention: The immersive nature of our app will lead to higher engagement and better retention of the training material.

Pump Operations: Principles of water, hose nozzles and flow rates, simulates pressure, flow and ground hydraulics based on theory. 

Water Supply: Principles of water supply including the use of hydrants and drafting operations.  Also includes selection of hose, use of hose appliances, deployment of hose lines, and nozzles.
